text:
@PeterDutton_MP What’s more important to you? 

1. COVID19 Tracking app

2. Registered paedophile tracking app

Before you answer read this article, especially if you have kids. I can tell you, this article is not isolated to Australia. @HumanHeadline @ScottMorrisonMP
